description: Erection of two additional storeys of residential on top of four existing storeys of commercial to provide 1 x 2 bed maisonette with a roof terrace.  The residential units will have its own lift access from ground floor.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed two storey extension by reason of it's design, detailing and it's failure to integrate successfully with the original building would constitute a prominent and harmful alteration at roof level in an otherwise unobtrusive roofscape, which would be harmful to the character and appearance of the host building, special interest of the adjacent Grade II Listed Building, remaining street elevation and surrounding Clerkenwell Conservation Area contrary to policies D1 (Overall Design), D3 (Site Planning), D4 (Designing in Context), D11 (Alterations and Extensions), D20 (New Development within Conservation Areas), D24 (Materials) and D25 (Roof Extensions) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, Section 2.3.3 (Materials) and 2.4.3 (Roof Extensions) of the Urban Design Guidelines 2006, Conservation Area Design Guidelines and Planning Policy Guidance 15 - Planning and the Historic Environment.
